title: Christie’s CEO on 2026 Art Sales Outlook
description: Bonnie Brennan, Christie’s CEO, discusses the 2026 art market outlook and the Jim Irsay collection with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close.” She says Asia is a key gateway for new and younger buyers. (Source: Bloomberg)
